/**
 @page LCD_8CHAR_14SEG_Demo

 @verbatim
 * @file    Mono_LCD/8CHAR_14SEG_Demo/readme.txt
 * @version V1.00
 * @date    2019-05-07
 * @brief   Description of the LCD example.
 @endverbatim

@par Example Description:

This example will displays the numbers 0 to 9 repetitively.

@par Directory Contents:

- Mono_LCD/8CHAR_14SEG_Demo/main.c               Main program
- Mono_LCD/8CHAR_14SEG_Demo/ht32fxxxxx_it.c      Interrupt handlers

@par Hardware and Software Environment:

- This example uses the LCD to driver VIM-878. For more information on VIM-878, 
  please refer to the VIM-878 datasheet.
- Please prepare VIM-878 and refer "ht32_board_config.h" for pin assignment.
